description: Refining AI models through adversarial prompting to identify edge cases and improve accuracy.
This program integrates robust software engineering with business strategy and team management, allowing me to align technical execution with overarching business goals

Backend Developer Intern at a home services startup. I was responsible for developing new features and refactoring existing modules, contributing to code optimization and scalability in a production environment.

This program provided a solid Full Stack foundation through a highly practical, project-based methodology. The continuous hands-on coding approach allowed me to rapidly master both frontend and backend technologies.
